content:
Another permissions adjustment request for a contrib repo:
https://github.com/backdrop-ops/contrib/issues/464

Maintainer change request 路 Issue #464 路 backdrop-ops/contrib
Can someone with appropriate permissions adjust the Github settings for search_api? @earlyburg is listed as a maintainer at this point but does not have write access. See: backdrop-contrib/search_a...
Done :+1: ...thanks @Laryn for reaching out via Zulip ...it's the best way to get a hold of me :wink:

As discussed in recent dev meetings, the PMC is currently voting on a new permissions policy for Github contrib projects. I posted the policy here:

https://forum.backdropcms.org/forum/proposed-github-permissions-policy

@jenlampton - I should have maintainer access on:
https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/views_bootstrap
https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/configurable_block_style

backdrop-contrib/views_bootstrap
This module provides a set of styles for the Views module. It allows you to create responsive Bootstrap 3.x components, such as grids, carousels, tabs, and tables, all within the configuration sett...
backdrop-contrib/configurable_block_style
Ability to style blocks through UI. Contribute to backdrop-contrib/configurable_block_style development by creating an account on GitHub.

Is this the official list of permissions now: https://forum.backdropcms.org/forum/proposed-github-permissions-policy ? If so, I can try updating repos where I already have admin access... (e.g. one I just looked at only gives 'write' access to the Security team (whereas that forum post says they should have 'admin' access...))
@BWPanda yes, maintainers should have "admin" access now :+1:
@StPaulTim I've fixed your access for those 2 repos ...can you please check and confirm that you have the access you need now?
@StPaulTim you already have admin access on those repos

Ah, as mentioned in the other channel, @klonos came to the rescue. I have gone through about half of contrib fixing permissions, but I'm tempted to spend time writing the automatic-fixer now instead. If anyone nedds access before that is done I think this channel is a great place to ask!
@jenlampton - I didn't. But, @klonos took care of it.
Yeah, sorry I clicked the link from my inbox and replied. Then I saw the other channel's convo later. whoopsie
@StPaulTim I started the zoom room

@klonos or @jenlampton Could you check that I have maintainer access on https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/special_menu_items? I was trying to push a commit and got access denied.

backdrop-contrib/special_menu_items
Enables creating placeholder and separator menu items. - backdrop-contrib/special_menu_items
@Laryn now you do :wink:
